name: Oliver's Adventures in the Fairyland
description:
A small andventure metroidvania game, where you playing as our-time teenager, who was summoned by wizard in fantasy world! And that wizard gave him a quest - return stolen king's treasures!

Game features:
- There's no autosaves or custom saves, you can save your progress only near checkpoints
- Open world! You can go whereever you want (and can, surely, he-he-he) in this dungeon
- A lot of upgrades, that can help you open new parts on dungeon and make you way easily
- BIG BOSSES!
- Retro style (pixel art and 8-bit music)
- Tonns of secrets!
- You can use all types of gamepads
- Only awesome gameplay! No boring dialoges! No stupid empty rooms! No hard lvl-up systems and anything like that! ONLY! AWESOME! GAMEPLAY!
